description: Try our easy to follow Piri Piri Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ chicken,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Piri Piri Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small red hot chillies, stems trimmed, deseeded (optional)
1 long red mild chilli, stem trimmed, roughly chopped
1 lemon, juiced and rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Using kitchen scissors, cut along both sides of the backbone of the chicken. Discard. Open out chicken and flatten, pressing down firmly with the heel of your hand. Make a few slashes in the drumsticks and thighs. Pierce all over with a fork. Set aside.

Process chillies, garlic, bay leaves, paprika, oregano, 2 tbs juice, rind, butter and 1 tsp salt to form a paste. Reserve half. Spread remainder over chicken, rubbing in well. Place in a baking dish, cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Bring chicken to room temperature 20 minutes before cooking.

Heat a barbecue grill on high. Cook chicken, skin side down, for 5 minutes. Turn and cook for a further 5 minutes. Reduce heat to medium and cook, turning halfway through, for 20 minutes, or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, stir remaining lemon juice into reserved paste. Transfer to a bowl and serve with chicken, fried potatoes and chargrilled lime.
